action.action-desc: Mr. Cawthorn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To direct the Commissioner of Social Security to conduct a study relating to administrative costs.

subsection.text: The Commissioner of Social Security shall conduct a study on ways toâ€”

paragraph.text: lower administration costs by at least 15 percent;
investigate means testing, flat benefits, and basing benefits pay outs on lifelong labor earnings; and
insure the solvency of the program.

subsection.text: Not later than 1 year after the date of enactment of this Act, the Commissioner of Social Security shall submit a report on the results of the study under subsection (a) to the Committee on Ways and Means of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Finance of the Senate.
